extendedInfo.description: So as many of you have noticed, the app is broken :( I apologise that I haven't got around to fixing it. I recently moved overseas and have just started to settle in. Now that I have some spare time, I've realised that the only copy of the source is sitting on a busted HDD over the other side of the world. How sad. Yes I know of Github/bitbucket etc. I'm looking into getting a new dev PC going though, so watch this space... ( Or start building it yourself and I'll help )A 2 x 2 widget for displaying the current value of Stocks, Bonds and Funds on the Bitcoin securities trading platform; BTC Trading Corp. Multiple instances of the widget can be loaded to display different ticker values.The widget's data is updated by tapping the refresh button.Configuring the widget provides access to an order book, trade history, dividend history and detailed information about the asset.If there is enough interest I will continue to develop the app into a fully featured trading client.Please send me feature requests, bug reports and Bitcoins!1DcdNVB64ULeVc7JuN1KUm8aYHPLx7WYDdDisclaimer: This is an unofficial app. I am in no way associated with BTC Trading Corp.To find out what bitcoins are, start here:http://www.bitcoin.org/

reviews.title: App shows no data?
reviews.comment: When I start the app the app shows no data. Great launch dev. RAZR Max.
reviews.author: Jason Alt

reviews.title: Great idea
reviews.comment: But not working on Samsung Galaxy S3 i9305. The app opens but it never loads.
reviews.author: Ned Bogdanic

reviews.title: Api based listing is returning nothing
reviews.author: Er Ic

reviews.title: Good start but
reviews.comment: Freezes after some time, needing me to remove it.
reviews.author: Chen Di

reviews.title: Too many issues
reviews.comment: User interface hidden until you enter the app through widget. Order book sorted by date, not price. Widget poorly designed so difficult to hit buttons, although it takes up 2x2 slots. Widget sometimes hang.
reviews.author: Bj\303\270rn Furuknap

reviews.title: No data
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to work with btctco anymore. Blank screen with just the action bar and a spinning progress bar that goes away after a few seconds. You should open source this and reply when you do.
reviews.author: Jon Willis

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Starting app results in it freezing.
reviews.author: Dan O

reviews.title: It\'s all blank
reviews.comment: I think something is broken.  I just installed it and all I see is a blank page with a few headings.
reviews.author: Fernanda Powers

reviews.title: needs to be open source, OK otherwise
reviews.comment: widgets are OK of you resize them to 2, they should be 1 cell though the app needs to be open source to be trustworthy list it on fdroid
reviews.author: wolverine ks
